Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-57852 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.96.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-57852 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.96.2-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.
